metadata.title: CVE-2020-22617 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Ardour v5.12 contains a use-after-free vulnerability in the componentardour/libs/pbd/xml++.cc when using xmlFreeDoc and xmlXPathFreeContext.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-22617` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ardour - 1:5.12.0-3ubuntu0.1
ardour-data - 1:5.12.0-3ubuntu0.1
ardour-video-timeline - 1:5.12.0-3ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ardour package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:5.12.0-3ubuntu0.1').
